schema.name: Eggplant Egg

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the eggplant thoroughly under cold running water.
Slice the eggplant into 1/2 inch thick rounds.
In a large skillet, heat a small amount of olive oil over medium heat. Add the eggplant slices and cook for 5 minutes on each side or until they become tender.
Crack the egg into a bowl and beat lightly.
Pour the beaten egg over the cooked eggplant in the skillet. Cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the egg is fully set.
Serve the eggplant egg hot. Enjoy your nutritious and delicious meal.

schema.description: This Eggplant Egg recipe is a healthy, delicious, and easy-to-make dish perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Embrace the essence of healthy eating with this delightful recipe that's sure to become a staple in your culinary collection.
